abstract: Mr. Levy, who was one of Eric T. Schneiderman’s first hires, is returning to the litigation firm Boies, Schiller & Flexner.
snippet: Mr. Levy, who was one of Eric T. Schneiderman’s first hires, is returning to the litigation firm Boies, Schiller & Flexner.
lead_paragraph: Harlan Levy, a top deputy to Eric T. Schneiderman, the New York attorney general, is leaving state government to return to the prominent litigation firm where he previously worked.

headline.main: Harlan Levy, Schneiderman Deputy, Is Leaving Attorney General’s Office
headline.print_headline: Top Deputy to Exit New York Attorney General’s Office to Rejoin Law Firm
